displayProperties.description:
Complete activities while in a clan to earn clan reputation. More difficult activities grant more progress. Playing with clanmates grants a large bonus to progression.

Complete Ranks to earn rewards!

You can also claim clan packages when your clan completes clan challenges. 

Clan challenges are progressed by:
• Winning matches in Crucible or Gambit
• Completing Raids or Nightfalls with half of your fireteam consisting of clanmates

Clan challenge progress can be seen on the clan screen.
